title: The cost price of an article is Rs. 7840. To gain 25%, what should the article be sold at? - Quora

response.answer_text: Buy it at Rs 7840 and resell it at what price to profit 25%? Rs 7840 / 4 = Rs 1960. Rs 7840 + Rs 1960 = Rs 9800. So if you buy it for Rs 7840 and sell it for Rs 9800, you will earn a 25% return.
